name: Send an OTP in MSG91 from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically send an OTP in MSG91. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/18BIel_87gJRo-a5XFSUvYiyCw3ve5P6naZJlypAkLTI/edit?usp=sharing).
